name: Need for Spirit: Drink & Drive Simulator/醉驾模拟器
description: Abysmal roads aside, the biggest enemy will be your very own addiction to the booze you’re transporting. Potholes seem harmless after you’ve transformed into an insatiable drunkard which suddenly thinks that he’s got the off-road skills to take as many shortcuts as needed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 1800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 Storage: 1800 MB available space
